function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in recreational activity due to lockdown","Impact":"Greater risk of disease transmission due to increased human interaction","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures and restrictions on large gatherings","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring public spaces and enforcing social distancing","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and local authorities"},{"Description":"Preference for green views leading to increased recreational activity","Impact":"Potential clustering of individuals in green areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promotion of dispersed outdoor recreational activities and education on the importance of avoiding crowded spaces","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns and signage for promoting safe outdoor activities","People":"General population","Owner":"Local park authorities and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in recreational use on remote trails due to social distancing advisories","Impact":"Risk of inadequate medical response in remote areas in case of emergencies or disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enhanced emergency preparedness and medical facilities in remote areas, and public education on safety measures in remote locations","Technologies":"Telemedicine and remote monitoring technologies for emergency response","People":"Hikers and outdoor enthusiasts","Owner":"Local emergency services and healthcare providers"}]}
